title: 999 Wins...
body:
Well... That took forever (honestly, it took two and a bit years), i'm not even sure if anyone does these posts anymore.. i used to see them all the time.

Anyway, if any one feels like joining me on my 1000th win or loss (that would be awfully awkward) feel free to add me :) 
IGN: Area2609
(still don't like the name)

replies.body: Add me - I can't play immediately but we can organise something!
Yeah I was planning on doing it but totally forgot and realised when I was at like 1007 lmao
